entry.title: A Diamond in the making
entry.summary:
Author: michellekoilover

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,881Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 632

Summary: Stiles went away after that night, leaving everything behind, his family, his home.Everyone looked at him like a murderer, a traitor with blood stained hands.He was going to prove himself a worthy ally, irreplaceable, supportive. Anything -but- a damn murderer.or...Stiles decides he wants to take the killer tag associated to his name and become the best support and healer the supernatural has ever seen.

entry.title: Become Familiar (With the Beat of Your Heart)
entry.summary:
Author: wrappedinwolfsbane (Galileoleo)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,995Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: “His kind see humans as food,” Argent hissed at him. “The beast feasts upon the flesh of man. How can you protect him?” “He has given us shelter,” Stiles answered, steadily, “Fed us when we were hungry. He has saved the life of my sister and I when you tried to burn her as a witch. Even if what you say is true,” he took a breath, “And he does intend to butcher me like a pig, then I shall sharpen his knives and prepare the logs for his fire. I shall offer him the recipes my mother taught to me with her own hands, and I shall scour the woods for the perfect herbs for him to roast me with.”

entry.title: Inch by Inch
entry.summary:
Author: SirenAlpha

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,887Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 774

Summary: When Scott had sworn Allison had freed Erica and Boyd, Stiles had assumed that would mean they would show up at school again. When they didn't, she thought figuring out what had happened to them would only involve asking Isaac about it, a simple one step plan.A one step plan that spiraled into a massive research project trying to track Erica and Boyd down and give Derek every advantage he could get against the latest supernatural threat: a pack of alphas.

entry.title: The Wolf at Winter’s Door
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,816Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 61

Summary: Winter is closing in on the Hale valley when Derek—an exiled alpha turned recluse—finds a half-frozen omega and a baby in the snow outside his cottage. He should have left them to the storm; he’s learned what kindness costs. But the sound of the infant’s cry, and the scent of something wild and familiar in the omega’s skin, pull at the part of him that still remembers how to protect, how to care, how to love.As the snow deepens and the fire burns low, Derek’s solitude unravels thread by thread.The omega’s name is Stiles—a runaway from a war Derek has long tried to forget. He carries secrets, grief, and a child who isn’t meant to survive the winter.In a world of fading magic, hunters, and ghosts of kingdoms lost to fire, two wounded souls find warmth in each other’s silence.But the past always finds its way through the snow.

entry.title: Inciting Spark
entry.summary:
Author: LLN3dseestheLight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,562Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 44

Summary: After Tobias Budge attacked Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham gets a phone call, his friend, John Stilinski, is dead, and his son, Stiles Stilinski, is in a coma. Will goes to Beacon Hills to Stiles. Emerging from a three-week coma, Stiles was told that his father, John Stilinski, had died in the accident that led to his coma, and that he had to find himself back in 2013. But that wasn't his most significant issue. No, it was the fact that in this reality, Will Graham was his biological father. Someone Stiles, only known as a TV show character!

entry.title: something about particle physics
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,966Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 134

Summary: A universe in which mated pairs always climax together, so if your mate is jerking off you get to experience a spontaneous orgasm—even across vast distances. -0- At least when he fantasizes about his unknown mate, when he takes himself in hand and gets off on purpose, he can pretend they’re having sex. That’s part of the evolutionary purpose, people say—when you have sex with your mate, you guarantee a simultaneous orgasm, thus increasing the bond, the intimacy, the connection. So he can pretend that his mate is there in the room with him, warm, with a firm touch, a soft mouth. He can’t tell if the details he imagines sometimes are real or just something he’s invented in his head. Sometimes he wakes up just before his mate brings them both off and he swears he can see green eyes. Sometimes he’s indulging in his own pleasure when he sees glimpses of a five o’clock shadow behind his eyelids. He can picture details but not the whole image of a face: a strong, sculpted jaw, dark hair mussed over a forehead, part of a smile.
